dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so the Ministry of Education has set the deadline for kindergarten applications as August 31st for the 2025/2026 year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so the Ministry of Education has set the deadline for kindergarten applications as August thirty first for the two thousand twenty five over two thousand twenty six year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they mentioned that in certain cities, like Astana and Shymkent, voucher distribution starts July 1st after the queue updates.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In cities and regions where the voucher funding system has been implemented, voucher distribution will begin after the queue is updated " starting from July 1. This applies to the cities of Taraz, Turkestan, Shymkent, Uralsk, Astana, Semey, Ust-Kamenogorsk, Zhezkazgan, Karaganda, Pavlodar, Petropavlovsk, Kostanay, Konayev, Kosshy, and Taldykorgan, as well as the Bayzak, Saryagash, Zhetysay, Sairam, Kazygurt, and Maktaaral districts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But parents really need to make sure their documents are complete and up to date, or the kindergarten can reject the application.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But parents really need to make sure their documents are complete and up to date, or the kindergarten can reject the application.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A kindergarten has the right to reject an application if the submitted documents are incomplete, expired, or if the ratio of unvaccinated to vaccinated children exceeds the permitted limit.
